   <form action="//www.wikinews.org/search-redirect.php" class="search-form">
    <fieldset>
     <!-- search-redirect.php is project-independent, requires a family -->
     <input name="family" type="hidden" value="wikinews"/>
     <select id="searchLanguage" name="language">

      </option>

       Türkçe
      </option>

      </option>

      </option>
      <!-- Zhōngwén -->

     </select>
     <input accesskey="F" autofocus="autofocus" dir="auto" id="searchInput" name="search" size="20" type="search"/>
     <button class="formBtn" name="go" type="submit">
      <img alt="Search" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/meta/thumb/7/7e/Vector_search_icon.svg/12px-Vector_search_icon.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/meta/thumb/7/7e/Vector_search_icon.svg/18px-Vector_search_icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/meta/thumb/7/7e/Vector_search_icon.svg/24px-Vector_search_icon.svg.png 2x"/>
     </button>
     <input name="go" type="hidden" value="Go"/>
    </fieldset>
   </form>
  </div>

  <div class="search-container language-search">
   <form action="//incubator.wikimedia.org/w/index.php" method="get" name="searchwiki">
    <input name="title" type="hidden" value="Special:SearchWiki"/>
    <input name="uselang" type="hidden" value="en"/>
    <input name="searchproject" type="hidden" value="n"/>
    <label for="langsearch-input">
     Find a language:
    </label>
    <input dir="auto" id="langsearch-input" name="searchlanguage" type="search" value=""/>
    <input class="formBtn" type="submit" value="  →  "/>
   </form>
